name: ExpandIcon
desc: A widget representing a rotating expand/collapse button. The icon rotates 180 degrees when pressed, then reverts the animation on a second press. The underlying icon is [Icons.expand_more].

fields.name: isExpanded
fields.desc: Whether the icon is in an expanded state.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback triggered when the icon is pressed and the state changes between expanded and collapsed. The value passed to the current state.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The padding around the icon. The entire padded icon will react to input gestures.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.ExpandIcon.color} The color of the icon.

fields.name: disabledColor
fields.desc: The color of the icon when it is disabled, i.e. if [onPressed] is null.

fields.name: expandedColor
fields.desc: The color of the icon when the icon is expanded.

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: Defines the splash color of the IconButton.

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.desc: Defines the highlight color of the IconButton.
